items.title: Trump's energy secretary nominee faces questions over climate posts and LA fires

items.title: The Transportation Department sues Southwest Airlines for alleged oft-delayed flights
items.description: The agency is seeking civil penalties against Southwest Airlines, and also fined Frontier Airlines for its continuous delays.
